description.narrative: Links to session 5 of Life Explored (https://www.ceministries.org/Groups/274684/Courses/Life_Explored/Life_Explored.aspx). Contains questions and relevant prompts for the admin.

question.narrative: Where do you find your identity?

prompt.scripture: John 1:12 "Yet to all who did receive him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God".
prompt.narrative: Do you know that your identity is found in God? That you are a child of the king? Whatever your life circumstances your identity will never change.
